description: An h3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to
online state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortOnline H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortId i 9999 H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortDescr s EXAMPLE

description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range
is h3cPexPortMinId to h3cPexPortMaxId.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortId

description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is
'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is h3cPexPortId.
Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the
default.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortDescr

description: An h3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to
offline state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortOffline H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortId i 9999 H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortDescr s EXAMPLE

description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range
is h3cPexPortMinId to h3cPexPortMaxId.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortId

description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is
'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is h3cPexPortId.
Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the
default.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPortDescr

description: An h3cPexPhyPortForwarding trap is sent when the PEX physical port
transitions to forwarding state.

event.Summary: PEX physical port transitioned to forwarding state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPhyPortForwarding H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind i 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE

description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind

description: A textual description of physical entity. This object
should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's
name for the physical entity, and should be set to a
distinct value for each version or model of the physical
entity.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr

description: An h3cPexPhyPortBlocked trap is sent when the PEX physical port
transitions from forwarding state to blocked state.

event.Summary: PEX physical port transitioned to blocked state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexPhyPortBlocked H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind i 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE

description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
variables.name: H3C-PEX-MIB::h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind

description: A textual description of physical entity. This object
should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's
name for the physical entity, and should be set to a
distinct value for each version or model of the physical
entity.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr
